page.title: 11LOVE'S THE BUTCHER'S
page.content: When we went to the butchers we saw them make sausages.First you put 3 pounds of cold water with white rusk.Then you put pork in a little hole and it came out in bits.Then they put 8oz of seasoning which is pepper and other spices.Then they mix it in.When that's done they put it in another machine called a filler.Then he gets some skin which is about 30 ft long and then soaks it in water to get the knots out.Then he pulls the skin onto a tube and turns it on.Then it all comes out into the skin.When that's done he pinches then twists it then he does loops.And in a day you can make 200 sausages.
